# Setup 
(run only @1st time)

## Setup (obligatory)

```
git config --global user.name "John Doe"
git config --global user.email johndoe@example.com
```

## Setup (neat)

```
git config --global color.ui true
git config --global core.editor nvim 
```

## Show setup

```
git config user.name 
git config --list
git config --list --show origin 
```
